attributes.action: Consider Renationalising Public Energy Services to reduce costs for home users
attributes.additional_details: To reduce excessive commercial profit margins which would still allow Government to use as an investment into future energy sources
attributes.background: To investigate this proposal as it could offer valued delivery and savings to many “home energy” users

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608056
